import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Divider } from 'antd'; import NumberFormat from 'react-number-format'; import './BillToPrint.style.scss'; export default class BillToPrint extends Component { render() { const { checkoutSession } = this.props; return (

  • SP SL TT
    • {checkoutSession.soldItems.map(item => (
  • {item.product.name} x{item.quantity}
